history.narrative: Law 19-278, the “Autonomous Vehicle Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-931. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 4, 2012 and Dec. 18, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Jan. 23, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-643 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-278 became effective on April 23, 2013.
